text: 12 p.m.: **Zits** aside, my skin looks **better** **than** it has in a long **time**.

_source.text: "After eight years of war, it's clear that domestically many [Western] political leaders are having to answer questions, this [war] has gone on a long time and it's no better than it was in 2004, so why are we maintaining it, will it get better?" he told the Financial Times on Monday.
